external_references.description: DFIR Report. (2021, November 29). CONTInuing the Bazar Ransomware Story. Retrieved September 29, 2022.

description: During [C0015](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0015), the threat actors used a malicious HTA file that contained a mix of encoded HTML and JavaScript/VBScript code.(Citation: DFIR Conti Bazar Nov 2021)
